name: Rogueslide
description:
Experience a new way to dungeon-crawl in Rogueslide, a casual strategy game for desktop and mobile. Each move is a puzzle as you slide tiles around the board, slaying monsters, drinking potions, and casting spells.

Survive 3 worlds of unique enemies and obstacles, or try your hand at the Daily Dungeon.

Rogueslide brings out the best of both worlds: sliding puzzle games and roguelike dungeon crawlers.

Gameplay is casual, yet each decision is strategic. Try it today!
